page.title: 05J.C.B.
page.content: This is a privately owned company founded 40 years ago by J.C.Bamford hence the initials J.C.B.It is a manufacturing,engineering company,the product,earth excavators aimed at the construction industry.There are 4 basic products with more specific orders taken.The cost varying 20-50 thousand pounds.8000 a year are sold,60% being exported all over the world.Raw materials and parts are brought into the factory by road and put together on an assembly track in a flow line system The factory employs 1417 workers of which 85 are women.25% of the workforce live in Rocester and Denstone.They have 23 days and 8 statutory days holiday with pay a year.They work 39 hours a week on a day and night shift.Office workers work 37 hours in the day time only.The company's Managing Director is Mr.A.P.Bamford,son of the founder.
